verses.roman:
advaita, nityānanda--caitanyera dui aṅga
aṅgera avayava-gaṇa kahiye upāṅga

synonyms: advaita—Advaita Ācārya; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; caitanyera—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dui—two; aṅga—limbs; aṅgera—of the limbs; avayava-gaṇa—the constituent parts; kahiye—I say; upāṅga—parts.
translation: Śrī Advaita Prabhu and Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu are both plenary portions of Lord Caitanya. Thus They are the limbs [aṅgas] of His body. The parts of these two limbs are called the upāṅgas.
